name: BrakeFailure
description: I made this game for the GMTK2020 game jam. The theme for this year was out of control, in which the speed of the car is out of control and your car does flips randomly. I made this game using Unity and Audacity to edit any sound effects. Any sources that I used during the process of making this game, are linked at the end of the game. This is the second game that I finished and my first time submitting a game into a game jam. Thank you for playing my game, I hoped you enjoyed and had fun.
